Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It impacted my. learning in sometimes the what was marked off was different so it gave contradicting feedback. But sometimes it gave me more to improve on because I had two different markings on where I needed to improve.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: No there was no difference in how I felt.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI feedback is more grammatical and structural whereas teacher feedback is more specific to the course.
